title: Rise of the product marketplace
description: Social media individualized the content viewing experience. AI will do the same to the product experience. Ever tried watching someone else’s TikTok feed? It’s horrible! Soon, spending five minutes on someone else’s food delivery app will feel just as jarring. That’s because AI now makes it possible to create bespoke user experiences at scale. This...
